测试目录：
E->D
M->D
W->D
M->E
W->E
W->M
一．E->D
lui $3, 203
lui $4, 203
beq $3,$4 next
ori $5,123
ori $6,123

next:
jal end
ori $8,$31,0
ori $9,$31,0
end:
ori $10,$31,0

16进制：
3c0300cb
3c0400cb
10640002
34a5007b
34c6007b
0c000c08
37e80000
37e90000
37ea0000

正确结果：
@00003000: $ 3 <= 00cb0000
@00003004: $ 4 <= 00cb0000
@0000300c: $ 5 <= 0000007b
@00003014: $31 <= 0000301c
@00003018: $ 8 <= 0000301c
@00003020: $10 <= 0000301c

二. M->D：
ori  $3, $0,203
addu $4,$0, 203 #要暂停
beq $3,$4 next
ori $5,123
ori $6,123

next:
jal end
ori $8,$31,0
ori $9,$31,0
end:
ori $10,$31,0

16进制：
340300cb
3c010000
342100cb
00012021
10640002
34a5007b
34c6007b
0c000c0a
37e80000
37e90000
37ea0000

结果：
@00003000: $ 3 <= 000000cb
@00003004: $ 1 <= 00000000
@00003008: $ 1 <= 000000cb
@0000300c: $ 4 <= 000000cb
@00003014: $ 5 <= 0000007b
@0000301c: $31 <= 00003024
@00003020: $ 8 <= 00003024
@00003028: $10 <= 00003024

三.W->D转发
ori $12, $0,321
ori $13, $0,321
ori $3, $0,4
sw $12, 0($3) #暂停
sw $13, 4($3) #暂停
lw $4, 4($3)
lw $5, 0($3)
beq $4,$5,end
ori $8,$0,123
ori $9,$0,123

end:
ori $31,$0,0

340c0141
340d0141
34030004
ac6c0000
ac6d0004
8c640004
8c650000
10850002
3408007b
3409007b
341f0000

@00003000: $12 <= 00000141
@00003004: $13 <= 00000141
@00003008: $ 3 <= 00000004
@0000300c: *00000004 <= 00000141
@00003010: *00000008 <= 00000141
@00003014: $ 4 <= 00000141
@00003018: $ 5 <= 00000141
@00003020: $ 8 <= 0000007b
@00003028: $31 <= 00000000

四.W->E/M->E转发
ori $3,$0,123
ori $4,$3,0
addu $5,$4,$3
addu $6,$5,$4
addu $7,$5,$6
subu $8,$7,$6

3403007b
34640000
00832821
00a43021
00a63821
00e64023

@00003000: $ 3 <= 0000007b
@00003004: $ 4 <= 0000007b
@00003008: $ 5 <= 000000f6
@0000300c: $ 6 <= 00000171
@00003010: $ 7 <= 00000267
@00003014: $ 8 <= 000000f6

五，W->M转发
ori $3, $0,12
ori $4,$0,123
sw $4,0($3)
addu $5,$4,$0
sw $5,4($3)

3403000c
3404007b
ac640000
00802821
ac650004

@00003000: $ 3 <= 0000000c
@00003004: $ 4 <= 0000007b
@00003008: *0000000c <= 0000007b
@0000300c: $ 5 <= 0000007b
@00003010: *00000010 <= 0000007b
